name: Inverse Finance
description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

en.name: Inverse Finance
en.description: Inverse Finance is a suite of permissionless decentralized finance tools governed by Inverse DAO. Their main products are Anchor: a money market, DOLA: stablecoin, and Dollar Cost Averaging Vaults. Users can have a say in Inverse DAO with its native INV token.

fr.name: Inverse Finance

es.descripción: Inverse Finance es un conjunto de herramientas financieras descentralizadas sin permiso gobernadas por Inverse DAO. Sus principales productos son Anchor: un mercado monetario, DOLA: moneda estable y vaults de promedio de coste en dólares. Los usuarios pueden opinar en Inverse DAO con su tokennativo INV.

tr.name: Inverse Finance
tr.description: Inverse Finance, Invers DAO tarafından yönetilen, izinsiz merkezi olmayan finans araçları paketidir. Başlıca ürünleri Anchor: para piyasası, DOLA: stablecoin ve Dolar Maliyet Ortalama Vault'udur. Kullanıcılar, yerel INV belirteci ile Inverse DAO'da söz sahibi olabilir.
